name: Cat-quaphobia
description:
You are a kitten, trying to get back to your mother, but the whole area is getting flooded by high waves, so DON'T TOUCH THE WATER!

Controls: A and D to move, SPACE to jump

(Submission to MAY DAY 2021, only my 2nd Game Jam)

Music from https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles
